IMPORTANT FOR ADRIENE TO SEE: I had a great inspiration today while working out and wanted to share with you as something to maybe try in one of videos. A video like this would be outside of your the typical flow of your 30 days journeys and more focused on having a very meditative experience. The main idea is what I was call a Yoga Breath Series - that instead of narrating while posing if you just used a head worn mic just to capture your inhales and exhales as you moved through poses and then you overlayed the narration afterwards. This way the student can really focus on their body-breath-mind connection while moving through each pose. I think this is a central part of the yoga experience but is something that you usually only can do once you've developed and memorized a practice but is hard to create during instruction because the instructor is having to narrate and guide during the poses. This would be different from the usual home practice vibe of your videos, but I think a few videos like this might catch on for those looking to really engage into an unfamiliar practice. I wanted to share this feedback cause I love your channel and how much great content you give away for free and hope the idea could contribute in some way to the success of these videos or maybe something you could share with a fellow content creator.
